Cutting Tools

  • Milling
  • Turning

  • Tooling System

Octomill

QuattroMill is a modern face milling cutter adapted for modern machine tools and meets the technical and quality demand from the metal cutting industry of today. QuattroMill is an extremely light cutting face-milling cutter with centre looked square inserts.

Specifications:

  • Two inserts size 05, and 09 covers cutter diameter from 20mm up to 315mm
  • Cutter with Normal, Normal+, and Close pitch
  • Depth of cut up to 3mm with 05 size, and up to 5mm with 09 size
  • 5xD, Coolant through, R1 shank
  • Total 533 products

    • Benefits:

  • Soft and easy cutting
  • Reliability
  • Simplicity
  • Performance
  • Versatility
